checks.name: README Documentation
checks.description: Checks that the repository has a README file with meaningful content. A good README helps users understand what the project is and how to use it.

checks.name: License File
checks.description: Checks that the repository has a LICENSE file. Proper licensing is essential for open source projects.

checks.name: CI Configuration
checks.description: Checks that the repository has continuous integration configuration (GitHub Actions, Travis CI, etc.).

checks.name: Test Coverage
checks.description: Checks that the repository has test files and test configuration.

checks.name: Scorecard Configuration
checks.description: Checks that the repository has a .scorecard.yml configuration file.

checks.name: OpenAPI Specification
checks.description: Checks that the repository has an OpenAPI specification file for API documentation.

checks.name: OpenAPI Quality
checks.description: Checks the quality of the OpenAPI specification including completeness and validity.

checks.name: API Environment Configuration
checks.description: Checks that API environments are properly configured in the scorecard config.

checks.name: Scorecard Badge
checks.description: Checks that the README includes a scorecard badge for visibility.

checks.name: Scorecard Config Quality
checks.description: Checks the quality and completeness of the scorecard configuration.

checks.name: CODEOWNERS File
checks.description: Checks that the repository has a CODEOWNERS file for code ownership.

checks.name: CODEOWNERS Quality
checks.description: Checks the quality of the CODEOWNERS file including valid team references.
